Mark your calendar! We’re hosting a webinar series for Long Island residents and would like to remind you that our last webinar is tomorrow. Learn why so many of your neighbors have gone solar and how Direct Energy Solar can help you go solar to dramatically shave your utility bill!
Go Solar on Long Island <[[http://directenergysolar.omnovia.com/register/44411456426921]]> Tomorrow: March 10, 12:00 PM Meet your local solar team at Direct Energy Solar and learn the latest on solar in our market.
WHAT YOU’LL LEARN: • How solar saves you money on your energy costs • What drives your cost of solar, and how much you may save • Local incentives that help you save even more • Why you need to decide soon, before the incentives disappear • No money down financing, purchase, and lease options—which are right for you?
